sentences.sContent: The thesis analyses the tendency in correlative aspects of testamental succession and intestate succession.
sentences.sContent_eng: The thesis analyses the tendency in correlative aspects of testamental succession and intestate succession.
sentences.sCn: 从遗嘱继承制度和无遗嘱继承制度的相关方面可了解这一变迁。

sentences.sContent: When someone dies intestate, the property automatically go to the survive partner unless there are children.
sentences.sContent_eng: When someone dies intestate, the property automatically go to the survive partner unless there are children.
sentences.sCn: 当某人无遗嘱死亡， 财产自动归幸存的伴侣，除非他还有孩子。

sentences.sContent: A person appointed by a probate court to administer the estate of a person who died intestate (without a will).
sentences.sContent_eng: A person appointed by a probate court to administer the estate of a person who died intestate (without a will).
sentences.sCn: 法院任命一个管理遗产的人而该已死的人没有订立遗嘱（无遗嘱）。

remMethod.val: in(无) + test(看到) + ate → 没有留下可以看的东西 → 未留遗嘱的

trans.tranOther: (of a person) not having made a will
